attributes.action: Close the MP final salary pension scheme in favour of a Money Purchase scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the financial drain on public resources as a result of the MP's final salary pension scheme, this scheme should be wound up and replaced with a Money Purchase scheme in line with the majority of UK employee scheme's. The existing scheme is an unneccesary perk for individuals who are already significantly financially advantaged and the cost is further increased and compounded by the salary rises that the house persists in awarding it's members.
